General.Name: GrandTech C.G. Systems
General.Description: GrandTech C.G. Systems Inc. operates as a distributor of graphics, imaging, and multimedia design software. The company distributes 2D and 3D professional software products; digital printing equipment and solutions; and IT software and hardware products for enterprises, as well as IT integration and cloud services. It operates in Taiwan, Hong Kong, China, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, and internationally. GrandTech C.G. Systems Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
